title: Veal tagine with preserved lemons
ingredients: ['3 large preserved lemons, quartered', '1kg boneless veal shoulder, cubed', 'a drizzle olive oil', '3 onions, finely chopped', '50 to 70g smoked bacon, cubed or lardons', 'a few threads of saffron', '1 rounded tablespoon cumin seeds', 'juice of one lemon']
